name: Batclock Original Necklace
description:
A Countdown original! This shiny batclock is our first necklace ever produced!

- 18" Long
- 1/4th inch Shiny Black Acrylic
- Round Clasp
- Homemade in USA, by Josh Olson

<strike>-------------------------------------------</strike>

For every necklace sold, 10% of the profit will be donated to the Red Cross Disaster Relief Fund.

The money donated will help people affected by disasters, like the recent tsunamis, and earthquakes.

Money donated enables the Red Cross to provide shelter, food, emotional support and other assistance to victims of all disasters.

<strike>-------------------------------------------</strike>

All acrylic necklaces are shipped in a eco friendly recyclable Mailer.
